dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Master Agnus, I have returned with the enchanted necklace and the powers it bestows upon me.

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: Ah, Leon. I sense the magic emanating from you. You've embraced the essence of the elite skeleton's power well. But there is much more at stake than mere enchantments.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: What do you mean, Master Agnus?

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: The necklace you hold is but a fragment of the greater puzzle that lies before us. Its power is significant, yes, but it pales in comparison to the darkness that Velius wields.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Velius... He appeared before me, taunting me with promises of power and darkness. He spoke of unlocking secrets and reshaping reality itself.

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: Velius is cunning, and his ambitions know no bounds. But we must remain steadfast in our resolve to thwart his plans. There is an ancient scroll, hidden within a cave, that holds the key to undoing the undead ritual Velius has invoked.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: A cave? Do you mean the mad wizard's lair?

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: Then I must venture forth once more, into the heart of danger, to retrieve this scroll and put an end to Velius' reign of terror.

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: Indeed, Leon. But remember, the path ahead is fraught with peril. Velius will not sit idly by as you seek to defeat him. Prepare yourself, for the true test of your strength and courage lies ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Leon
dialogues.message: I will not falter, Master Agnus.

dialogues.speaker: Agnus
dialogues.message: Go forth, Leon, and may the light guide your path.
